column4: im having problems playing java games (ex: pogo.com) since updating to hardy.  is that due to the beta version of firefox it shipped with, or the newer java? and if so, where can i get the older ones?
it says firefox2, but it says its 3beta5 when i go to 'about'
you probably won't be able to get the older versions for Hardy
I'm a little nudged by it... but I assume the official release for 3.0 will be out soon
